abstract: Instead of asking who could replace Mark Hurd at Hewlett-Packard, Fortune asks: who would want Mr. Hurd? The answer: lots of companies.
snippet: Instead of asking who could replace Mark Hurd at Hewlett-Packard, Fortune asks: who would want Mr. Hurd? The answer: lots of companies.
lead_paragraph: Ever since the Hewlett-Packard affair broke on Friday, people in the tech community have focused mostly on who might replace ousted chief executive Mark V. Hurd.
